Name: The Bible
Description: On use, Isaac gains flight for the current room. Instantly kills  Mom,  Mom's Heart, and  It Lives when activated, but kills Isaac when used on  Satan.

Name: The Boomerang
Description: Throws a boomerang which retrieves pickups, as well as damages and petrifies enemies hit for 2 seconds.

Name: The Candle
Description: Throws out a flame that damages everything in its path, diminishing in size as it travels.

Name: Converter
Description: Converts two   Soul Hearts or   Black Hearts into one filled   Red Heart Container. Converts one   Soul Heart or   Black Heart into one filled   Red Heart Container.

Name: Deck of Cards
Description: Gives Isaac a random card.

Name: The Jar
Description: When at full health, up to 4 extra   Red Hearts can be stored in The Jar. Activating drops the stored hearts on the ground.

Name: Magic Fingers
Description: Uses 1   Penny to deal damage to all enemies in the room.

Name: Mom's Bottle of Pills
Description: On use, gives Isaac a random pill.

Name: Pandora's Box
Description: Upon use, spawns specific pickups or items depending on the floor it is used on. Disappears after use.

Name: Portable Slot
Description: Upon use, consumes 1   Penny and has a chance to drop a random pickup, like a  Slot Machine.

Name: Red Candle
Description: Throws out a flame that damages everything in its path, diminishing in size as it hits enemies or blocks shots.

Name: Remote Detonator
Description: Bombs placed by Isaac only explode when Remote Detonator is used. Gives 5 bombs.

Name: Blank Card
Description: Copies the effect of the card or rune currently held by Isaac. Copies the effect of the card currently held by Isaac. The charge time is based on the power of the card.

Name: Box of Friends
Description: Duplicates all of Isaac's familiars for the current room. If Isaac has no familiars, spawns a  Demon Baby for the room instead.

Name: Diplopia
Description: Duplicates all pickups and item pedestals in the room.

Name: Glowing Hourglass
Description: Rewinds time, putting Isaac back in the previous room and undoing anything that happened in the current room.  Can only be used three times per floor, after which it functions like The Hourglass until the next floor.

Name: Jar of Flies
Description: Killing an enemy adds a fly to the jar, up to a maximum of 20. On use, releases Blue Flies equal to the number of flies in the jar.

Name: Mom's Box
Description: Increases luck by 1 and doubles the effects of trinkets while held. When used, drops a random trinket on the ground.

Name: Placebo
Description: When used, copies the effect of the pill Isaac is currently holding without consuming it. Does not copy the effects of cards or runes.

Name: Tear Detonator
Description: When used, will detonate any tears currently on the screen and cause each one to split into 6 more tears which will fire in a circle, similar to Tammy's Head.

Name: Ventricle Razor
Description: Can be used to place an orange portal and a blue portal. Upon entering a portal, Isaac is teleported to the other portal.

Name: Wooden Nickel
Description: When used, has a 50% chance to drop a random coin.

Name: Compost
Description: Doubles Isaac's Blue Flies and Blue Spiders, or spawns one if Isaac has none. Converts pickups in the current room into Blue Flies or Blue Spiders.

Name: Coupon
Description: While held, guarantees one item in every  Shop will be on sale. On use, makes a random item in the current room free.

Name: Dull Razor
Description: Hurts Isaac without depleting health, activating any items that trigger upon taking damage.

Name: Moving Box
Description: If the box is empty, picks up items and pickups in a room and stores them. If the box is not empty, places all stored items and pickups in the current room.  Can carry up to 10 items or pickups at once.

Name: Mr. ME!
Description: Summons a controllable ghost that can perform various tasks depending on what it targets.

Name: Mystery Gift
Description: Upon use, spawns a random item from the current room's item pool, with a chance to spawn  A Lump of Coal or  The Poop instead.

Name: Potato Peeler
Description: Removes a Heart Container, increases damage and range, and grants a Cube of Meat.

Name: Smelter
Description: Consumes Isaac's currently held trinket and applies its effect permanently.

Name: Crooked Penny
Description: Spawns a penny and has a 50% chance to double all items and pickups in the room. If the effect fails, the items and pickups disappear.

Name: Mama Mega!
Description: Damages all enemies and destroys all obstacles. The effect occurs every time a new room is entered for the rest of the floor. Opens the doors to the floor's Secret Rooms and Super Secret Rooms.

Name: Plan C
Description: Kills all enemies in the room, then kills Isaac three seconds later.

Name: Alabaster Box
Description: Spawns three   Soul Hearts and two  Angel Room items and is consumed. Starts with no charges, and can only be charged by picking up 6 Soul Hearts.

Name: Eraser
Description: Throws an eraser that instantly kills the first monster it hits, and prevents that monster from spawning for the rest of the run. Can only be used once per floor.

Name: Mom's Bracelet
Description: Lets Isaac pick up and throw rocks,   TNT,   Poops, friendly Dips,   Bombs, and other obstacles.

Name: Notched Axe
Description: Isaac destroys obstacles and opens  Secret Rooms by walking into them, but cannot shoot or pick up items until it's cancelled. Toggles between tears and the pickaxe, which can be swung to attack and break obstacles. Using it depletes the charge, and it can't be used until next floor once the charge runs out.

Name: Sharp Key
Description: Adds 5   Keys on pickup. Allows Isaac to throw his keys to deal damage to enemies, destroy obstacles, and open doors.

Name: Keeper's Box
Description: Spawns a random shop item or pickup which can be bought for its normal price.

Name: Magic Skin
Description: Consumes one heart container or two   Soul Hearts to spawn an item and give Isaac a broken heart container that can never be filled. If Magic Skin isn't being held after being used, it is very likely to replace any future items.

Name: 9 Volt
Description: Reduces the charge of any activated item by 1. Any 1 charge items instead have timed recharges.

Name: The Battery
Description: Activated collectibles can store an extra level of charge, allowing them to be used twice in one room.

Name: BFFS!
Description: Increases the size and effectiveness of most familiars.

Name: Black Candle
Description: Prevents curses. Grants one   Black Heart. Increases the chance for a  Devil Room or  Angel Room to appear.

Name: Blue Map
Description: Reveals the locations of  Secret Rooms and  Super Secret Rooms on the map.

Name: Bogo Bombs
Description: All normal   Bombs become   Double Bombs.

Name: Broken Watch
Description: Every 4th newly discovered room entered will slow down or speed up every enemy and their attacks. The chance to slow enemies is quite higher than the chance to speed them up.

Name: Champion Belt
Description: +1 damage. Increases the chance of champion enemies appearing by 15%.

Name: The Compass
Description: Reveals the locations and types of all special rooms on the map, except  Secret Rooms and  Super Secret Rooms.

Name: Fanny Pack
Description: Has a chance to drop a random pickup when Isaac takes damage.

Name: Habit
Description: When Isaac is hit, his active item gains 1 room's worth of charge.

Name: Hive Mind
Description: Increases the size of Blue Spiders and Blue Flies and doubles the amount of damage they deal.  Also increases the effectiveness of fly and spider familiars.

Name: Humbling Bundle
Description: Transforms   Bombs,   Keys,   Pennies, and   Red Hearts into their respective Double versions.  This will occur 50% of the time.

Name: The Ladder
Description: Allows Isaac to walk across gaps one square across by automatically placing a ladder between the two walkable sections.

Name: Little Baggy
Description: Isaac can hold 2 pills at once and all cards and runes are replaced by pills.

Name: Mom's Coin Purse
Description: Spawns 4 random pills near Isaac.

Name: Mom's Key
Description: Adds 2 keys.   Chests will drop additional pickups.

Name: Mom's Purse
Description: Allows Isaac to hold one additional trinket.  Drops a random trinket.

Name: PHD
Description: Converts all bad pills into good pills, spawns one pill pickup, and identifies all pills. Restores two   Red Hearts and increases the payout of  Blood Donation Machines.

Name: Piggy Bank
Description: Gives 3   Pennies on pick-up. Every time Isaac is damaged, he will drop one or two additional pennies.

Name: Sharp Plug
Description: Damages Isaac in exchange for fully recharging Isaac's current activated item.

Name: Starter Deck
Description: Isaac can hold 2 cards at once and all pills are replaced by cards.

Name: Steam Sale
Description: Reduces all Shop prices by 50%, rounded down to 7 coins for an item, rounded up to 2-3 coins for a pickup.

Name: Stop Watch
Description: +0.3 speed. Automatically inflicts slow to all enemies in every room.+0.3 speed. Upon taking damage, inflicts slow to all enemies for the current room.+0.3 speed. Slows all enemies in every room to 80% speed.
Quote: Let's slow this down a bit...

Name: There's Options
Description: Two items appear after defeating a Boss. Only one can be taken; the other will disappear.

Name: Treasure Map
Description: Reveals the map of each floor. It does not identify special rooms and does not reveal the locations of  Secret Rooms /  Super Secret Rooms.

Name: Car Battery
Description: Causes Isaac's activated item to activate twice on each use.

Name: Charged Baby
Description: Spawns a familiar that occasionally drops a   Lil' Battery, gives an active item charge, or petrifies all enemies in the room.

Name: Deep Pockets
Description: Allows Isaac to carry two cards or pills (or a combination of both) at the same time. Increases the coin cap to 999. If a room would otherwise yield no reward, 1-3 coins will spawn.

Name: More Options
Description: Two item pedestels are presented in every  Treasure Room. Only one can be taken; the other will disappear.

Name: Night Light
Description: A cone of light shines in the direction Isaac is moving that slows enemies and enemy shots.

Name: Pay to Play
Description: +5   Coins. Most doors require one   Penny to open instead of a   Key. +5   Coins. All locked doors,   Locked Chests, and Key Blocks must be opened with one   Penny instead of   Keys.

Name: Restock
Description: Causes  Shops to instantly restock their items when they are bought.  Outside of Greed Mode, the restocked item's cost is increased after each purchase.

Name: Spider Mod
Description: Displays Isaac's tear damage and enemy health bars. Spawns a familiar that wanders around and inflicts random status effects on enemies it touches. Can spawn a   Lil' Battery/Blue spider upon clearing a room.

Name: Chaos
Description: Drops 1-6 random pickups on the floor. Causes items to be chosen from random item pools.

Name: Sack Head
Description: Coins,   Bombs,   Keys, cards, runes and batteries have a chance to become   Grab Bags.

Name: Blanket
Description: Grants one   Soul Heart. Upon entering a boss room, grants a shield that blocks one hit, then disappears.

Name: Broken Modem
Description: Enemies, enemy shots, tears, and pickups will briefly freeze in place at random intervals.

Name: Buddy in a Box
Description: Spawns a familiar with a random tear effect. The familiar is randomized at the start of each floor.

Name: Jumper Cables
Description: Grants an active item charge every 15 enemies killed.

Name: King Baby
Description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and makes other familiars follow it. While firing tears, other familiars stop moving.

Name: Poke Go
Description: Upon entering a room with enemies in it, has a chance to spawn a random friendly enemy that persists across rooms.

Name: Schoolbag
Description: Allows Isaac to hold two active items.

Name: Tarot Cloth
Description: Drops a random card or rune.  Doubles the effects of most cards and runes.  Doubles the effects of tarot cards.

Name: Sack of Sacks
Description: Spawns a familiar that drops a   Grab Bag every 5-6 rooms cleared.

Name: 4.5 Volt
Description: Active items don't charge when clearing rooms. Instead, they're charged by dealing damage to enemies.
Quote: Beat the juice out of them!

Name: Battery Pack
Description: Recharges Isaac's currently held active item and drops 2-4 batteries.

Name: Birthright
Description: Grants a character-specific effect that enhances their special abilities.

Name: Booster Pack
Description: Drops 5 random cards.

Name: Dream Catcher
Description: During the transition between floors, Isaac's nightmare shows the contents of the  upcoming floor's  Treasure Room, as well as the floor's boss. Grants a   Half Soul Heart when entering a new floor.

Name: Keeper's Sack
Description: Gives range, speed, or damage when buying things from a shop. Also spawns three coins and a  Key on pickup.

Name: Member Card
Description: Adds a trapdoor to every  Shop that leads to a second shop with a unique stock and marked-up prices.

Name: Options?
Description: If a room gives a reward when cleared, there will be two different rewards to chose from. Taking one causes the other to disappear.

Name: Red Stew
Description: Refills all heart containers. Grants an enormous damage boost that wears off over time.

Name: Voodoo Head
Description: Spawns an additional  Curse Room on each floor. Curse Rooms have improved layouts.

Name: Card Reading
Description: Spawns two portals at the beginning of each floor that each lead to either the  Boss Room,  Treasure Room, or  Secret Room.
